articles.description: The American Aeronautics and Space Agency (NASA) postponed the Venus exploration mission from 2028 to 2031 due to the budget cut by US President Joe Biden. Sue Smrekar, principal investigator of the m

articles.title: NASA's Chandra observatory discovers wind effects of nearby galaxy - ecns
articles.description: A new study using NASA's Chandra X-ray Observatory shows the effects of powerful winds launched from the center of a nearby galaxy, NGC 253, located 11.4 million light-years from Earth.
articles.content:
A new study using NASA's Chandra X-ray Observatory shows the effects of powerful winds launched from the center of a nearby galaxy, NGC 253, located 11.4 million light-years from Earth.
